ProjectDescr.Title: Standardization and commercialization of micro-ventricular organoid cardiomyopathy modeling platform
ProjectDescr.Description: Standardization of micro-ventricular organoids and cardiomyopathy modeling platforms. Development of an ultra-dense/standardized microventricular organoid culture platform. Development of a standardized platform-based organoid culture technology for cardiomyopathy derived from reverse differentiated stem cells of cardiomyopathy. Development of technology for analyzing microventricular organoids and cardiomyopathy models based on computer imaging/deep learning

Grant.Title: Standardization and commercialization of micro-ventricular organoid cardiomyopathy modeling platform
